attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To change the law, so that nobody,can allow their bushes of any kind, or privets, to protrude, into the neighbours garden,through a hedge, over a fence etc.
When this happens, the neighbour then has to cut something that doesn't belong to them, nor do they wish to do so.
An Englishman's home is his castle,what grows in 1 garden, should stay in that garden.

rejection.details:
Your title should be a call for action, not a statement / name.

Also, a similar petition already exists:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Leylandii-hedges/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
